extendedInfo.description: View full-detail, 3D textured models and animations from over 20 different formats.â¢ View, rotate, zoomâ¢ Full-screen modeâ¢ Material support with transparency and custom diffuse/specular/ambient lightingâ¢ Register as default viewer for supported model typesâ¢ Import from local storage, or stream from http/https/ftp sourcesâ¢ Preloaded with sample models (courtesy of Assimp)â¢ Supported model formats include:    â¢ FBX (ascii), 3DS, BLEND, DAE (Collada), PLY, STL, OBJ, SMD, X, LWO, LXO, LWS, XML, DXF, HMP, MD2, MD3, MD5, MDC, MDL(Quake), NFF, TER, AC3D, MS3D(Milkshape), IFC-STEP, ASEâ¢ Supported material texture formats include:    â¢ BMP, CUT, DDS, DOOM, HDR, GIF, JP2, JPEG, LBM, MDL, PAL, PBM, PCD, PCX, PGM, PIC, PNG, PPM, PSD, PSP, RAW, SGI, TGA and TIF(F)â¢ Pro-Only Features:    â¢ Skeletal animation playback from common formats, including BVH, .DAE, .MD5 and .X     â¢ Adjust render quality    â¢ Dark and light backgrounds    â¢ Basic model statistics    â¢ Wireframe rendering    â¢ Light intensity and direction control    â¢ On-screen viewing controls    â¢ Load/disable textures after model import    â¢ Normal (bump) mapping supportâ¢ Coming Soon:     â¢ Screen-space ambient occlusion    â¢ Faster anti-aliasing

reviews.title: Amazing..bionic man
reviews.comment: Now this is my kind of game.just by using common sence  have done completely changed all the textures n files with ease. I\'ve loaded countless different obj,mtl files without fail.. amazing work! Is there any way possible to add a text editor that would make it 110%
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app and does what is says but...
reviews.comment: For some odd reason it does not work with my Spen on my note 2.  I\'ve never encountered this before and considering I use my pen for most things it\'s very odd for me.
reviews.author: Isiac DaGraca

reviews.title: Tested, then bought.
reviews.comment: When you catch a really good app you know right away.
reviews.author: Maximilian Y.

reviews.title: Nice App
reviews.comment: like it very much. Thanks developer.
reviews.author: Asadouzzaman Asad

reviews.comment: Excellent
reviews.author: sathish raj

reviews.title: I can\'t believe this is free
reviews.comment: Hi just wanted to say thanks for making this app. the controls are VERY nice. One suggestion would be to have default views for looking at front, side, back, etc.. I am upgrading to the paid app. Thanks again
reviews.author: Benjamin R Laurence

reviews.title: Good but has consistency issues
reviews.comment: The default models and a couple of obj files opened ok..but some other obj exported from the same software doesnt work well. None of the .blend files tried worked. When it works though its good.
reviews.author: nirmal david

reviews.title: This guy takes care
reviews.comment: The COLLADA import is dramatically improved since last couple of releases, as stated by the author, hence the new mark. The best 3D model viewer for Android so far.
reviews.author: Satrap Nalbandian

reviews.title: Touch screen only
reviews.comment: Navigation not possible without a touch screen. I am using an MK-808  with keyboard and mouse and it is not possible to use this app without touch. Fix that and see a better review.
reviews.author: Evan Williams

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Just bought the pro version.
reviews.author: danipikeno .

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Finally I have found an excellent app that allows me to show off my models when at conventions and video game industry gatherings. This is what I have been looking for for months! My only requests would be the ability to change the lighting in the scene, and toggle a wireframe/wireframe over shaded mesh ability. Can\'t wait to see what comes next.
reviews.author: Alex Smithing

reviews.title: Looks great
reviews.comment: Any chance of .zae compatibility?
reviews.author: Jonathan Jones

reviews.title: Like it!
reviews.comment: Fantastic app for viewing your models on the go. 1st class response from the dev when I had a minor problem too. Everything I could ask for and more. :)
reviews.author: Karl Coombs

reviews.title: Very Happy
reviews.comment: Downloaded it to view Google Sketchup 3D objects (my house) on my phone. This is done by exporting the native skechup drawing to a 3D collado (.dae) item. First I had some problems with reversed X-axle in my object and seeing all parts of the drawing. Thanks to the support that was sorted at in one evening.  Thanks, now I am going to change it for the pro version.
reviews.author: Han Sytsma

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It cant read models with physics, certain maps such as tga or source uv mapping, anything with bones it wont load, and cant export the most common file x.   So this has a long was till I can give 3 stars. I know this is one of two apps that does this but as a model maker this needs more options noy just imports.  Otherwize Id just use pmd editor to view models on computer. Than waste phone memory.
reviews.author: Dionn Runk

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Five stars! Please keep updating
reviews.author: jayden morth

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Works quickly, smooth interface. Great for mobile demos.
reviews.author: Wendy Lee

reviews.title: Best Android 3D viewer out there...
reviews.comment: Good UI, touch view control, and other user controls/settings....I purchased the pro version after a couple of minutes...
reviews.author: Dana McPhee

reviews.title: Clean interface, loads quickly
reviews.comment: Loads many different formats, even .fbx
reviews.author: Heather Duke

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Opened big obj file wile others can\'t
reviews.author: Di B
